title: Value of K - 4mol of X and Y produce 6mol of Z

content.prompt:
X(g) + Y(g) â‡„ 2Z(g)

When 4.00 mol each of X(g) and Y(g) are placed in a 1.00 L vessel and allowed to react at constant temperature according to the equation above, 6.00 mol of Z(g) is produced. What is the value of the equilibrium constant, Kc ?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
